recordLookups.name: Get_All_Weights_for_today
recordLookups.label: Get All completed Weights for today

fields.name: Copy_1_of_LogWeightInstructions
fields.fieldText: {!$Label.FlowStyles_Box}To to log the weight of your foster animals, press the button below. You will be able to select which animals you are logging. Choose the animals and log their weights.

fields.name: TreatmentsTextMulti
fields.fieldText: {!$Label.FlowStyles_Box}To complete the treatments for your foster animals, press the button below. You will be able to select which treatments you are completing.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_NoteInstructions
fields.fieldText:
{!$Label.FlowStyles_Box}To to log a note about your foster animals, press the button below. You can choose which animals you want to log a note for.

-

fields.name: QuestionaireText2
fields.fieldText: {!$Label.FlowStyles_Box}The foster team requests that you complete a questionnaire for one or more of your animals. Please navigate to your foster animal's record page and fill out the questionnaire.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_NoteLoggedSuccessBadge
fields.fieldText: {!$Label.Flow_Styles_Badge_Success_Logged}

fields.name: Copy_1_of_NoteNotLoggedBadge
fields.fieldText: {!$Label.Flow_Styles_Badge_Warning_Not_Logged}

fields.name: LogWeightInstructions
fields.fieldText:
{!$Label.FlowStyles_Box}To log the weight of your foster animal, press the button below, input the weight, and then press finish.

-

fields.name: Treatments
fields.fieldText: Treatments

fields.name: TreatmentsText
fields.fieldText: {!$Label.FlowStyles_Box}To complete the treatments for your foster animal, press the button below, select your treatments, and then press the Complete Treatment button.

fields.name: NoteInstructions
fields.fieldText:
{!$Label.FlowStyles_Box}To make a note on your foster animal, press the button below. Notes will notify the foster team.

-

fields.name: QuestionaireText1
fields.fieldText: {!$Label.FlowStyles_Box}The foster care team requests that you complete this questionnaire about your current foster animal. Please press the button below to complete it.

fields.name: NoteLoggedSuccessBadge
fields.fieldText: {!$Label.Flow_Styles_Badge_Success_Logged}

fields.name: NoteNotLoggedBadge
fields.fieldText: {!$Label.Flow_Styles_Badge_Warning_Not_Logged}

fields.name: NoAnimalsSingle
fields.fieldText: You do not currently have any foster animals in care
